Name: Button VR
About the game: Button VR is a game where the core idea is to press the button to progress to the next level with each new level having increasingly harder puzzles and new content to solve. The Levels have been tried and refined too many times to count in order to give the best experience to guide new players into the understanding of the complexity that forms into your environment. Size matters and so does movement so whether you barely have enough space for your arms and sit in a chair or a full lounge to run and jump around. Puzzle VR has been designed to cater your needs. Building a tower of blocks may not be the fastest way to solve the puzzle but it surely was fun and relaxing. Surprising new content shows up throughout the game as you progress allowing you to stay interested and creative. The bow and arrow being an end game item yet crucial for future update levels.
